title: 'Confident' Castle gives Spurs back-to-back ROYs
description: Stephon Castle garnered 92 of 100 available first-place votes to give the Spurs the franchise's fourth Rookie of the Year award.
author: Michael C. Wright

title: Luka covers cost to restore vandalized Kobe mural
description: Lakers star Luka Doncic made a $5,000 donation Tuesday to cover the cost of a vandalized mural depicting Kobe and Gigi Bryant in downtown L.A.

title: PSG pass masters make Rice and Arsenal's fears come true
description: PSG's pass masters make Declan Rice's fears come true as Arsenal struggle to keep Champions League hopes alive, says chief football writer Phil McNulty.

title: We have to do something special in Paris - Arteta
description: Arsenal boss Mikel Arteta says his side will have to "do something special in Paris" if they are to reach the Champions League final following defeat in their semi-final first leg.

title: Bucks coach Doc Rivers said Damian Lillard determined that he’s ‘not going out this way’ after Achilles injury
description: Damian Lillard tore his left Achilles during Game 4 of the Bucks’ playoff series with the Pacers on Sunday.
author: Ryan Young

title: NBA playoffs: Tyrese Haliburton's game-winner finishes off collapsing Bucks as Pacers advance
description: What a comeback for the Pacers. What a collapse by the Bucks, playing without Damian Lillard.
author: Jack Baer

title: Arteta insists Arsenal can 'do something special' in return leg in Paris
description: Mikel Arteta insisted Arsenal are capable of producing a special moment to overturn their first-leg defeat against Paris Saint-Germain and reach the Champions League final.

title: Arsenal fail to rise to the occasion against PSG on deflating night
description: Arsenal's stage was set to deliver a famous night at the Emirates. The reality was far from it in the end, as Mikel Arteta's side came up short against Paris Saint-Germain with a deflating performance.
